name: LeRoy Pack
summary: Senior banking executive focused on leading lending teams within financial institutions. Experienced in consumer and small business lending, mortgage underwriting, cross-selling strategies, client relationship management, and portfolio growth. Skilled in cash flow modeling, treasury solutions, and building cross-divisional collaboration to achieve organizational goals.

experience.title: Supervisor, Consumer Loans
experience.description: Oversight of consumer loan operations and portfolio management at a 215M asset credit union.

experience.title: VP Small Business Banking
experience.description: Led small business banking with emphasis on cross-selling, retention strategies, and growth of mortgage production and client relationships. Recognized among top consumer loan producers; implemented incentive models and training.

experience.title: AVP - Business Banking
experience.description: Sold clients' financial products; implemented cross-selling strategies; underwrote and funded small business loans; managed a $22MM sized portfolio; developed inter-divisional communication to align mortgage, retail, and small business segments; built cash flow modeling and treasury solutions for clients.

experience.title: AVP, JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A.
experience.description: Prospected and fostered new business relationships with small businesses; underwrote and funded small business loans; contributed to top rankings in client retention for mortgage officers; developed incentive models to grow mortgage production; sold deposit and investment products; provided cash flow modeling and treasury solutions.

education.degree: BS in Chemistry, Business and Accounting
